author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Rizvi Traverse Management Cuts Share Stake In Snap Inc To 8.3 Mln Class A Shares
text:
May 15 (Reuters) - Rizvi Traverse Management LLC:
* RIZVI TRAVERSE MANAGEMENT LLC CUTS SHARE STAKE IN SNAP INC TO 8.3 MILLION CLASS A SHARES FROM 9 MILLION CLASS A SHARES - SEC FILING
* RIZVI TRAVERSE MANAGEMENT LLC - CHANGE IN HOLDINGS ARE AS OF MARCH 31, 2018 AND COMPARED WITH THE PREVIOUS QUARTER ENDED AS OF DEC 31, 2017 Source For the quarter ended Mar 31, 2018: bit.ly/2KpoEpi Source For the quarter ended Dec 31, 2017: bit.ly/2wIcTbP Further company coverage:
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
